options.description: Overwrite any existing reports
Specific config file to load, after those in MultiQC dir / home dir / working dir. (PATH)
Specify MultiQC config YAML on the command line (TEXT)
Report filename. Use 'stdout' to print to standard out. (TEXT)
Create report in the specified output directory. (TEXT)
Ignore analysis files (GLOB EXPRESSION)
Ignore sample names (GLOB EXPRESSION)
Ignore symlinked directories and files
Supply a file containing a list of file paths to be searched, one per row
Use only this module. Can specify multiple times. (MODULE NAME)
Do not use this module. Can specify multiple times. (MODULE NAME)
Use only modules which tagged with this keyword (TEXT)
View the available tags and which modules they load
Prepend directory to sample names
Prepend n directories to sample names. Negative number to take from start of path. (INTEGER)
Do not clean the sample names (leave as full file name)
Use the log filename as the sample name
TSV file to rename sample names during report generation (PATH)
Report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified. (TEXT)
Custom comment, will be printed at the top of the report. (TEXT)
Report template to use. (default|default_dev|gathered|geo|sections|simple)
TSV file containing alternative sample names for renaming buttons in the report (PATH)
TSV file containing show/hide patterns for the report (PATH)
Custom CSS file to add to the final report (PATH)
Use only flat plots (static images)
Use only interactive plots (in-browser Javascript)
Export plots as static images in addition to the report
Force the parsed data directory to be created.
Prevent the parsed data directory from being created.
Output parsed data in a different format. (tsv|json|yaml) [default: tsv]
Compress the data directory.
Do not generate a report, only export data and plots
Creates PDF report with the 'simple' template. Requires Pandoc to be installed.
Increase output verbosity. (INTEGER RANGE)
Only show log warnings
Use strict linting (validation) to help code development
Add analysis of how long MultiQC takes to run to the report
Don't upload generated report to MegaQC, even if MegaQC options are found
Disable coloured log output
Show the version and exit.
Show this message and exit.
